title: Requirements Gathering for Emotion Regulation Wearable
description: Gather all project requirements including user needs, technical specifications, and regulatory compliance. This includes researching the latest advancements in emotion detection technologies (such as facial recognition, voice analysis, and biometric sensors), neurostimulation technologies, understanding the user's emotional state context and preferences, determining suitable interfaces for providing gentle neurostimulation, and assessing potential integration with existing health monitoring systems. Additionally, consider incorporating machine learning algorithms to improve emotion detection accuracy.

title: Design the Emotion Detection System
description: Develop an algorithm that accurately detects various emotional states from physiological signals.

title: Design the Neurostimulation System
description: Develop a safe and effective neurostimulation system that can help regulate mood.

title: Design the User Interface
description: Create an intuitive and attractive user interface for easy interaction with the wearable.

title: Develop the Wearable Hardware Prototype
description: Create a functioning prototype of the wearable device.

title: Integration of Hardware and Software Components
description: Combine the hardware and software components to create a functional wearable.

title: Thorough Testing of the Wearable Device
description: Perform comprehensive testing to ensure the wearable functions as intended. This includes checking functionality, usability, and safety.
dependencies: Integration of Hardware and Software Components

title: Device Certification and Regulatory Compliance
description: Obtain necessary certifications for the wearable device to comply with international regulations. This includes FCC (US), CE (EU) and IC (Canada) certifications.

title: Documentation and User Manual
description: Write clear documentation and a user manual for the wearable device, including setup instructions, troubleshooting guide, FAQ section, and usage examples. Ensure the documentation is accessible to users with various technical backgrounds and is translated into multiple languages for global accessibility. Include detailed explanations of the neurostimulation process and potential side effects, and provide clear warnings and precautions in the user manual.
dependencies: Integration of Hardware and Software Components

title: Deployment of the EmotionRegulationWearable
description: Prepare for and execute the deployment of the wearable device.
